title: 📄whitepaper
desc: On October 31, 2008, the Whitepaper that first described Bitcoin was published on a cryptography mailing list. Only 8 pages — read it!

msgs.text:
On October 31, 2008, the Whitepaper that first described Bitcoin was published on a mailing list for those interested in cryptography.

You should read it if you never have before. Most of it is very easy to understand. It's only 8 pages of text: https://bitcoin.org/bitcoin.pdf

Here's my Tweet thread describing the Whitepaper:
https://twitter.com/NEEDcreations/status/1495550707776245760?s=20&t=_nfFsUo10d-6zbEXCXvU9w
I also recommend "The Book of Satoshi" as a concise introduction to many of the discussion Satoshi engaged in at the public release of bitcoin.

The Book Of Satoshi: The Collected Writings of Bitcoin Creator Satoshi Nakamoto
Attached free PDF
Purchase: https://amzn.to/3dWTytJ
